net.sf.freecol.common.networking

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.networking.Connection
      • net.sf.freecol.common.networking.ClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ClientConnection
extends Connection
    The client connection to a server. Extends the basic connection to remember the host and port to allow reconnection.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientConnection

        public ClientConnection(java.lang.String host,
                        int port,
                        MessageHandler handler,
                        java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new ClientConnection.
        Parameters:
        host - The host to connect to.
        port - The port to connect to.
        handler - The MessageHandler to use.
        name - The name for the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an exception is thrown while creating a new Connection.
